data.text: @j_kalven I was working in my local hospital upto a few months, and as for jobs not being able to feed your kids because you are barred from working or even having a bank account. Yeah no way people will starve or consider suicide.
@j_kalven Really what evidence do you hve that the standard of living is worse under Putin? My friends and family who live in Crimea say other wise. https://t.co/8YVnwQtLA7
@_BusinessBear And I also deal with world hunger charities. Do you?

@_BusinessBear Lives are more important then jobs, jobs can be resumed lives cannot. As for their hunger then they are gonna get far worse under Putin. Just for the job you have. So guess what they much rather fight to starve then be under Putin.

@j_kalven Wow you mean like all the people that have lost their jobs due to covid lockdowns? Or how about all the people starving BEFORE Russia invaded due to the incompetence of the Ukrainian government. I guess those people dont matter to you.
@_BusinessBear So sad to see people like you so far gone
@_BusinessBear then focus on the people actually suffering and not the media. it really is that simple. After all, people want empathy to come back. Well, why don't you be an example of it?
@TR2049 If I dont need to show my vax papers sure. If it means I can get out of Canada.
@ngrypacifist Said the bot that was made 2 seconds ago https://t.co/xAQJwsJx1D
@j_kalven I do know people in both situations and it changes nothing for me. Media lies are still lies
